title: Vegetable Soup with Matzo Balls and Dill Oil
directions: Over medium heat, heat oil and add chicken bones, onion and garlic and cook covered until it starts to be aromatic, about 5 minutes. Add celery root, leeks and carrots and cook covered for 10 minutes stirring occasionally. Add stock and simmer about 1 hour.

Whip eggs in a bowl until pale and frothy. Add seltzer, mix in matzo meal and blend well with a fork. Let sit for at least 15 minutes, up to 1 hour. This can be done while soup is simmering. When ready, form the mix into balls, 8-10 for large, 16 for small. Add some salt to broth, drop balls into simmering broth and cook small for 8 minutes, large for 1
Add cook veg (recipe follows) and simmer additional 5 minutes. Season soup.

In a small pot with lid, heat oil on medium heat, add carrots and celery root with a pinch of salt and cook the vegetables slowly, no color, for 5 minutes. Add leek and cabbage and cook additional 5 minutes. For the dill oil, -mix together and let stand at least 1 hour. Spoon over soup when serving.
ingredients: 1 cup celery root, peeled, cut into small pieces
